item.name: ScrapyardHackAlpha
item.description: We can attempt to activate this ancient Scrapyard and gain control of an ancient Centerpice of exceptional value. The AI will not take this lying down, so we should expect some heavy assaults in response. If we fail this hack, the AI will blow up the Scrapyard, and we will have lost our chance.
